fulltext:
Pham Tran Ha Dong
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
SUMMARY 
More than 10 years' experience in software development as a full stack developer, I have been 
successfully contributing to many projects for both outsourcing and products with different roles 
such as developer as well as the team leader. 
I experienced in working with Agile Scrum development process, experienced in working with 
international teams, have a good knowledge of web development, responsible for the features from 
requirement definition, prototyping, implementation to testing and maintenance, support the 
internal customer in finding, analyzing, resolving issues, and delivery of the committed tasks in time. 
EXPERIENCE 
  SAP LABS VIETNAM | GERMANY 
Jan 2012 – May 2019 
Senior Software engineer | SAP Analytics Cloud 
Act as a team leader, take the responsibility to drive the team develop new feature for SAP Analytics 
Cloud. 
Key responsibilities 
• 
Work directly with the Lead Architect in Germany to clarify the concept and the high-level 
architect. 
• 
Collaborate with Product Owner to clarify the requirements, and breakdown tasks for the team 
ready to implement. 
• 
Integrate the front-end and back-end which is written as a java micro service and deployed it 
to SAP Cloud Platform to have a full cycle of the feature. 
• 
Mentor the junior colleagues in the team. 
Key achievements 
• 
Successfully release the 1st version on time and receive very good feedback from the 
stakeholders in Germany. 
Utilized Skill Sets 
• 
React, Redux, Typescript, JavaScript, Webpack, Java, Micro services, SAP Cloud Platform and 
Hana database. 
Senior Software engineer | SAP IT Operation Analysis (ITOA) 
Act as a team leader, take the responsibility to build an analytics tools for analyzing the health and 
performance of IT landscape. 
Key responsibilities 
• 
Work closely with the Lead Architect in Germany, discuss and clarify the architect and technical 
feasibility. 
• 
Collaborate with Product Owner to clarify the requirements, and breakdown tasks ready for 
the team to implement. 
• 
Collaborate with the UX designer to offer a best user experience for the product and to ensure 
least complex implementation. 
• 
Develop major features from front-end to back-end with high quality.  
• 
Set up the UI testing component based on SAP OPA5 framework. 
• 
Set up the development environment when moving to the new architect. 
• 
Support internal customers to analyze and resolve issues. 
• 
Mentor the junior colleagues to catch up quickly. 
Key achievements 
• 
Successfully develop a prototype to migrate the project from the old architect to the new one 
in 2 weeks hackathon in Germany. 
• 
Deliver successfully product with high quality to the SAP market. 
• 
Join DKOM event in Palo Alto (USA) in 2017 to show up the product and shared technologies 
using. 
• 
Being selected as a SAP Catalyst in 2018 to become a Development Expert. 
Utilized Skill Sets 
• 
JavaScript, SAP UI5 framework, SAP HANA XSA framework, HANA database, QUnit test, OPA5 
framework, QUnit test, Google Blockly. 
Senior Software engineer | SAP WebIDE 
Act as a team leader, take responsibility to develop a powerful, extensible, web-based tool that 
simplifies the development application lifecycle. 
Key responsibilities 
• 
Work closely with colleagues in Germany to build the product. 
Key achievements 
• 
Successfully develop the project to show up the ability, productivity at work 
• 
Well collaborate with Germany and India colleagues. 
Utilized Skill Sets 
• 
JavaScript, HTML, jQuery, CSS, SAP HANA XS Classic framework, HANA database. 
  PYRAMID CONSULTING - PYCO GROUP | BELGIUM 
Jan 2007 – Dec 2011 
Senior Software engineer | Out sourcing projects 
Take responsibility to develop new and maintain many outsourcing projects for dedicated customer 
Belga News Agency in Belgium. 
Key responsibilities 
• 
Directly get requirement from the customer, analyze, develop and maintain features. 
Key achievements 
• 
Release the feature on time and quickly support customers to analyze and fix issues. 
• 
Well collaborate with colleagues in Belgium and get very good feedback from the customers 
and stakeholders. 
• 
Be promoted to a senior developer after one year joined the company. 
Utilized Skill Sets 
• 
JavaScript, HTML, jQuery, CSS, JSP, Java, Struts, Spring framework, Hibernate, MySQL, Oracle 
DB 
CABABILITY 
SAP TECHNOLOGY 
• 
SAP HANA Database, SAP UI5, SAP HANA XSA programing model, SAP HANA XSC, SAP cloud 
platform. 
• 
OPA5 testing framework, QUnit test, Jenkins. 
• 
Technical Architecture Modelling (TAM). 
SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT 
• 
Java, JavaScript, Struts framework, Spring framework, Hibernate, JSP, HTML, CSS. 
• 
MySQL, Oracle DB. 
• 
Micro services. 
• 
Google Blockly. 
SOFT SKILLS 
• 
Highly responsible. 
• 
Good at analyzing and solving problems.  
• 
Well communicate and collaborate with colleagues.  
• 
Good team driven and mentor new members. 
• 
Able to work independently and self-management. 
• 
Open and quickly adapt to new changing. 
EDUCATION 
University of Science – B.A. Information of technology 
2005 
REFERENCES 
References are available upon request.

• Collaborate with Product Owner to clarify the requirements, and breakdown tasks for the team ready to implement.
